name: ESC_APE
description:
Something happened in the lab during the night. That's your chance to escape !!!

This is a rather short roguelike game made for 7DRL 2020. That was an interesting week with pretty bad timing (one kid with chickenpox, the other teething :D ) but managed to do this little thing anyway.

This was also an experiment to try out what godot could do as a roguelike engine. If I have time I'll try to expend this further. This could serve as a base for next year 7DRL hopefully :)
